# RFSA - SMALL BOATS

## Contract Notice Information

### Solicitation Information
*   Solicitation Number: E60MC-190001/L
*   Solicitation Title: RFSA - SMALL BOATS
*   Publication Date: 24-Jan-2023
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Amendment Date: 29-Jun-2023
*   Tender Closing Date: 07-Jul-2023 14:00:00

### Contract Description

The contract is a competitive procurement where all interested suppliers can submit a bid. The trade agreement is not applicable, and the crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The delivery date is expected to be above-mentioned.

### Contract Details

*   Contracting Entity Name: Public Works and Government Services Canada
*   Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   Contracting Entity Contact Information:
    *   Name: Vicki Robson
    *   Email: vicki.robson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
    *   Phone: (613) 286-4376
*   Document Description
*   Qualifications: Bidder must meet the Invitation to Supply (ITS) requirement.
*   Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Desirable Skill/Experience:
	+ Bidder must have experience in the manufacturing or purchasing of small boats within the past three years.
	+ Bidder's technical capability along with pricing strategy will be considered.
	+ Bidder must confirm that they have obtained all necessary permits and approvals required for the production and shipment of the small boats.

### Contract Attachments
*   Invitation to Supply (ITS) PDF
*   Amendment 001 PDF
